property.name: zeppelin.server.allowed.origins
property.description: Allowed sources for REST and WebSocket requests (i.e. http://onehost:8080,http://otherhost.com). If you leave * you are vulnerable to https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ZEPPELIN-173

property.name: zeppelin.jobmanager.enable
property.description: The Job tab in zeppelin page seems not so useful instead it cost lots of memory and affect the performance. Disable it can save lots of memory

property.name: zeppelin.interpreter.lifecyclemanager.class
property.description: LifecycleManager class for managing the lifecycle of interpreters, by default interpreter will be closed after timeout

property.name: zeppelin.interpreter.lifecyclemanager.timeout.checkinterval
property.description: Milliseconds of the interval to checking whether interpreter is time out

property.name: zeppelin.interpreter.lifecyclemanager.timeout.threshold
property.description: Milliseconds of the interpreter timeout threshold, by default it is 1 hour

property.name: zeppelin.notebook.public
property.description: Make notebook public by default when created, private otherwise
